scripts.build:linux: cd ./cmd/agentgo && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run check:version && wails build -m -clean -s -skipbindings -tags webkit2_41 -platform linux/amd64 -ldflags="-X main.Version=$VERSION_TAG"
scripts.build:mac: cd ./cmd/agentgo && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run check:version && wails build -m -clean -s -skipbindings -platform darwin/universal -ldflags="-X main.Version=$VERSION_TAG"
scripts.build:win: cd ./cmd/agentgo && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run check:version && wails build -m -clean -s -skipbindings -nsis -platform windows/amd64 -ldflags="-X main.Version=$VERSION_TAG"
scripts.build:withbindings: pnpm run touch:tmp && cd ./cmd/agentgo && wails build -devtools -m -clean -v 2 -ldflags="-X main.Version=v0.0.1"
scripts.run:watch: cd ./cmd/agentgo && pnpm run build:frontend && wails dev -s -v 2 -tags webkit2_41 -ldflags="-X main.Version=v0.0.1"
scripts.lint: pnpm -F frontend run lint && pnpm run lint:goci
scripts.test: pnpm -F frontend run test && pnpm run test:go
scripts.lt: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test
